name: The Zoo Trip
description:
The Zoo Trip

Well come to The Zoo Trip Game.

The Zoo Trip for fun, a zoo story for all kids and toddlers.

The Zoo Trip Game Features

- The game introduces various animals to the child (e.g. elephants, pandas, birds, dolphins and many others).
- The child learns what the animals eat.
- The game is afoot! Follow an adventurous main story through dozens of fun missions.


So if you like this kind of games, this new Unique Games app is made for you!

Come try it now and share it with your friends!

********************* About Unique Games *****************************

Unique Games brings you the latest creations of most loved categories of games and apps which are all hugely loved by kids and all peoples. We are entirely devoted to build user friendly games related to fun and learning for better educational familiarities and enjoyment for kids and all peoples. Stay with us for the latest updates of Unique Games on Google play and get more of games.

Don't forget to give us a good rate if you enjoy our game!
